name: The void (itch) (Saturn91)
description:
Controll your spaceship and glide trough the endless void. Fight the enemies and try to get to improve your highscore.

This game was made with Pico 8 within a week and was my first ever pico8 game. Really enjoed programming it. 

Controls:

- move: Keyboard->Arrows, joystick -> Axis 1

- shoot : x

- start/restart game -> c

made by Saturn91
